name: xcfreader-monorepo
description: Monorepo for xcfreader and related packages

scripts.test: npm run --workspace=packages/xcfreader test && npm run --workspace=packages/ui-xcfimage test
scripts.coverage:all: npm run coverage && npm run --workspace=packages/ui-xcfimage test:coverage
scripts.build: npm run --workspace=packages/xcfreader build && npm run --workspace=packages/ui-xcfimage build
